scripts.alltest:reports: npx playwright test && npx playwright show-report
scripts.chormiumtest:reports: npx playwright test --project=chromium && npx playwright show-report
scripts.firefoxtest:reports: npx playwright test --project=firefox && npx playwright show-report
scripts.webkittest:reports: npx playwright test --project=webkit && npx playwright show-report
scripts.debugtest:reports: npx playwright test --debug && npx playwright show-report
